parameters.description: Used to store transaction amount as 'Ceiling' ie rounded number.
Used in a Accrual-Purchase process in IF block, check if previous balance is negative, which impacts on whether new voucher will be generated
Used to limit only a single lineitem will Dummy voucher node in API response
Output from Decision Table which is used to multiply the Transaction Amount for 'effective points', eg. $1 x 1 = 1 point, $1 x 2 = 2 points
to define what format will be the output from Decision Table
Count of how many times to execute direct voucher issue
Counter to track how many voucher issued directly in Process
this multiplier is 'delta' on top of Base. Eg. if Base =1 and promotion is to give 2x , then this multiplier is 2 - 1 = 1 (being the delta)
store beginning balance in its own dedicated EA, (snapshot store), because the running balance will change due to new Order
this is flag to indicate whether we need to generate new voucher due to new order

to track on LINEITEM level, how much if redeem voucher amount, used to ensure Transaction Amount for Purchase journal with VoucherCode will be 'zero-ized' ie. Transaction amount - this LineItemVoucherFaceValue amount
stores cumulative value of pro rata apportionment of reduction in negative balance by lineitems' points
this always equal to Negative Currency value, used for LINEITEM level context in our calculation of change to Currency (debit or credit)
tracks at lineitem level the rewards earned within this single Order
for a new Order with Redemption of Vouchers, which could be multiple, we use this to total them up (total facevalue)
to track on a Per Order basis, ie single Order API call, how many 'new' points for that Order
this always equal to Positive Currency value, used for LINEITEM level context in our calculation of change to Currency (debit or credit)
this keeps whatever is 'left' after using points that qualify for new voucher (ie meeting target voucher points), eg. 250 points - 200 points is used for new voucher, what is left = 50
this is 'piggy bank' level tracking, how many points collected so far and whether the 'target' is reached yet
store vouchercode generated by Flow for use in Direct Issue Voucher
this is the Single lineitem Dummy voucher face amount
this is the count of total number of vouchers to issue , used in generate voucher flow to create voucher records
this stores the value retrieved from the Negative Currency 'get'
this stores the value retrieved from the Positive Currency 'get'
{!TransactionJournal.MemberId}
actual vouchers to issue after deducting 3 vouchers issued directly via Process
{!TransactionJournal.Order_ID__c}
stores currency balance whenever needed for calculations
CEILING({!DT_Outcome.Multiplier__c} *{!BasePointsEarned})
stores the total of points that qualifies for voucher (can be multiple of voucherTargetPoints), in single Order
{!TransactionJournal.LoyaltyProgramId}
NOT USED except v5
parameter used in calculations, stores the total per Order points 'earned' by a new Order
stores the value of a single voucher , eg $10 per voucher
the 'threshold' of how many points needed to meet 'goal' ie. qualify for voucher issuance

actions.actionName: Sync Rewards Tracking with Positive Currency Balance

actions.actionName: Get Original Points Credited for Purchase perLineItem and perOrder

actionParameters.value: MID( {!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} , FIND({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} , {!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} ) + LEN({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} ), FIND('@' , RIGHT({!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} , LEN({!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} ) - (FIND({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} ,{!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} ) +LEN({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} )) )) )

actions.actionName: Assign per LineItem Points to Reverse & perOrder ReturnTotalAmount

actionParameters.value: VALUE( MID( {!ConcatenatedPointsCreditedOutput} , FIND({!OrderIdItemChannelKey} , {!ConcatenatedPointsCreditedOutput} ) + LEN({!OrderIdItemChannelKey} ), FIND('@' , RIGHT({!ConcatenatedPointsCreditedOutput} , LEN({!ConcatenatedPointsCreditedOutput}) - (FIND({!OrderIdItemChannelKey},{!ConcatenatedPointsCreditedOutput} ) +LEN({!OrderIdItemChannelKey})) )) ) )

VALUE( MID( {!ConcatenatedTotalReturnAmount} , FIND({!returnPerOrderTotalAmountKey} , {!ConcatenatedTotalReturnAmount} ) + LEN({!returnPerOrderTotalAmountKey} ), FIND('@' , RIGHT({!ConcatenatedTotalReturnAmount} , LEN({!ConcatenatedTotalReturnAmount} ) - (FIND({!returnPerOrderTotalAmountKey} ,{!ConcatenatedTotalReturnAmount} ) +LEN({!returnPerOrderTotalAmountKey} )) )) ) )

'Starting position of digit =' & TEXT(FIND({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} , {!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} ) + LEN({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} )) & ' ; ' & 'Ending position digit =' & TEXT( FIND('@' , RIGHT({!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} , LEN({!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} ) - (FIND({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} ,{!ConcatenatedreturnChannelValue} ) +LEN({!returnPerOrderChannelKey} )) )) )

actions.actionName: Positive Balance Tracking EA Current Value
Get Original Transaction Amount of Order
Extract Total Orginal Order Amount per OriginalOrderId

actionParameters.value: VALUE( MID( {!ConcatenatedOriginalOrderAmount} , FIND({!OriginalOrderAmountKey} , {!ConcatenatedOriginalOrderAmount} ) + LEN({!OriginalOrderAmountKey} ), FIND('@' , RIGHT({!ConcatenatedOriginalOrderAmount} , LEN({!ConcatenatedOriginalOrderAmount} ) - (FIND({!OriginalOrderAmountKey} ,{!ConcatenatedOriginalOrderAmount} ) +LEN({!OriginalOrderAmountKey} )) )) ) )
